General.Name: Brogent Technologies
General.Description: Brogent Technologies Inc., a technology company, provides digital content creation services in Taiwan. Its business primarily includes software and hardware research and development, manufacturing and system integration, theater design, planning, and construction capabilities. The company offers media-based rides, which include i-Ride, a flying theater built on six degrees of freedom motion platform; m-Ride, a flying theater built on the design of 180-degree turn; VR airship; v-Ride 360, a cylinder screen that offers 360-degree panorama balloon ride; t-Ride, a Jurassic age ride; and Q-Ride, an ultrarealistic ocean VR Airship ride adventures. It also provides gaming based rides, such as d-Ride, a media based interactive dark ride solution for gaming; and miRide, a real-time controllable mini 6DOF platform. In addition, the company offers digital museum products comprising Gesture Magic that offers 4D experience in gaming; and PaintFun, a motion platform, as well as content solutions. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
